spec.name: Gunslinger
spec.subtitle: The Quick Draw
spec.description: The Gunsligner knows better than most that making a living in the Outer Rim Territories is a constant struggle. He needs to be fast on the draw to stay alive. The Gunslinger and his beloved sidearm are inseperable, but he often carries a holdout weapon when stuck in a hostile, target-rich environment. To face off iwth a Gunslinger is a dangerous and foolish proposition.

talents.name: Grit
talents.description: Gain +1 Strain Threshold

talents.name: Quick Strike
talents.description: Add 1 Boost per rank of Quick Strike to combat checks against targets that have not acted yet this encounter

talents.name: Rapid Reaction
talents.description: Suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks in Rapid Reaction, then add an equal number of Success to initiative checks.

talents.name: Quick Draw
talents.description: Once per round, draw or holster a weapon or accessible item as an incidental

talents.name: Lethal Blows
talents.description: Add +10 per rank of Lethal Blows to any Critical Injury results inflicted on opponents

talents.description: After a successful combined check with two Ranged (Light) weapons, additional hits can be allocated to other targets within range of the weapon.

talents.name: Natural Marksman

talents.name: Deadly Accuracy
talents.description: When acquired, choose 1 combat skill. Add damage equal to ranks in that skill to one hit of successful attack made using that skill
